tweets.name: Stevie Feliciano
tweets.body: Stevie Feliciano is a library scientist living in New York City. She likes to spend her time reading, running, and writing.

tweets.name: Veronika Ossi
tweets.body: Veronika Ossi is a set designer living in New York who enjoys kittens, music, and partying.
